attributes.action: To allow civil weddings to take place during 2021 lockdown
attributes.additional_details: This allows people who have been waiting for months to a year to get legally married the way people who are in their death beds are. It will have the same risk as someone who is in their deathbed. But, for those who are not in their deathbed you should only allow bride, groom and two of their witnesses.
attributes.background: We want you to allow simple civil ceremonies to take place during the lockdown which only includes bride, groom and two of their witnesses.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565330
